level.heading: Chapter 3 of this title applicable to associations.
level.text: Chapter 3 of this title shall apply to associations formed under this chapter, except to the extent that it is in conflict with this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Former ยง 29-938 has been recodified as ยง 29A-938.
